newsitem.title: GERMANY: German union IG Bau to hold news conference Friday.
newsitem.headline: German union IG Bau to hold news conference Friday.

text.p: German construction workers' union IG Bau said on Thursday that it planned to hold a news conference at 1200 GMT on Friday.

IG Bau said in a statement that it planned to release details of the talks with employers -- due to be held on Friday -- aimed at averting a strike in the construction sector after negotiations over wages and sick-pay broke down last week.
